tagAssignment.googleCategoryHelpText: Google Category field.Selected field should be sent as google category.

account.enabledHelpText: Account enabled indicator for merchandising/product sync
account.nameHelpText: The name of Nosto account. You are able to find it on top-right corner on your Nosto dashboard.
account.idHelpText: The unique Nosto account identifier. You are able to find it on top-right corner on your Nosto dashboard.
account.productTokenHelpText: A token for accessing the Products API. You can request an API token (API_PRODUCTS) by getting in touch with Nosto support personnel. Once the token has been granted, you will be able to find it listed in the authentication tokens section in the admin.
account.emailTokenHelpText: A token for managing customers using the Blacklist and GDPR APIs. You can request an API token (API_EMAIL) by getting in touch with Nosto support personnel. Once the token has been granted, you will be able to find it listed in the authentication tokens section in the admin.
account.appTokenHelpText: A token for accessing the new GraphQL APIs. You can request an API token (API_APPS) by getting in touch with Nosto support personnel. Once the token has been granted, you will be able to find it listed in the authentication tokens section in the admin.

deferredInit.label: Initialize Nosto Script After First Page Iteration
deferredInit.helpText: This setting is a web page performance tweak. This setting is a web page performance tweak. If this setting is enabled, Nosto script will be loaded and initialized directly after user scroll page down (first interaction) on very first page visit. On all further page reloading/visiting, Nosto script will be loaded and initialized immediately.

merch.label: Enable Nosto Merchandising.
merch.helpText: By enabling this setting, Nosto Merchandising feature will be activated. Please make sure you have setup all necessary product merchandising rules before enabling this feature.

notLoggedInCache.label: Enable PLP Cache for Not Logged In Customers.
notLoggedInCache.helpText: When merchandising feature is enabled, Whole PLP HTTP page cache is being disabled to prevent caching of the personalized PLP products for all customers. You can enable PLP HTTP cache for Not Logged In customers (not-personalized) to prevent storefront performance issues.

featuresFlags.enableProductPropertiesHelpText: The checkbox enables product properties tagging.
featuresFlags.enableAlternateImagesHelpText: The checkbox enables alternate images tagging.
featuresFlags.enableInventoryHelpText: The selection enables inventory levels tagging.
featuresFlags.enableCustomerDataToNostoHelpText: If the checkbox is checked, customer data is tagged during the order.
featuresFlags.enableSyncInactiveProductsHelpText: If the checkbox is checked, inactive products will be synchronized as well.
featuresFlags.enableReloadRecommendations: Reload Recommendations After Adding a recommended product
featuresFlags.enableDailySynchronizationHelp: If the field is enabled products will be synchronized at the mentioned time each day
featuresFlags.timeDailySynchronizationHelp: The option specifies at which time to sync daily product synchronization
featuresFlags.enableProductPublishedDateTaggingHelpTex: If the checkbox is checked, product publishing date will be tagged as well.
featuresFlags.enableReloadRecommendations: Reload Recommendations After Adding a recommended product
featuresFlags.enableReloadRecommendationsHelpText: If the checkbox is checked, the recommendations will be reloaded after adding a recommended product

messages.error-message: Something went wrong, please check your configuration settings.
messages.blank-field-error: This field cannot be left blank!
